faqs.question: What is Team Vibhav?
faqs.answer: Team Vibhav is the departmental club of Electronics and Communications in Technical Fest Nimbus at NIT Hamirpur.

faqs.question: What is Vibhav Day?
faqs.answer: Annually, Fest Nimbus's Team Vibhav organizes Vibhav Day, featuring a variety of entertaining games open to all, regardless of their branch or year.

faqs.question: What are the Domains of Team Vibhav?
faqs.answer: Team Vibhav contributes in different type of domains like AI/ML, Embedded System,IOT, AR/VR, Web Development, DPW,Blockchain and many more.

faqs.question: What Events Does Team Vibhav Organise?
faqs.answer: Vibhav hosts various awareness programs such as 'Pahal', informative games at both institutional and departmental levels, as well as workshops covering trending topics

faqs.question: What is Pahal?
faqs.answer: 'Pahal', an event orchestrated by Team Vibhav, serves as an awareness campaign aimed at informing individuals about various government policies that have not yet gained widespread recognition.

faqs.question: How can Vibhav contribute to your personal Development?
faqs.answer: Vibhav conducts a range of internal workshops providing comprehensive overviews of various domains. Interested members receive guidance tailored to their preferred domain, fostering personal development.

faqs.question: What are Team Vibhav Ambitions Ahead?
faqs.answer: Our aspirations include maintaining our status as the premier departmental team of the Technical fest Nimbus, while also expanding further within our domain.
